All Superinterfaces:
Disposable
All Known Implementing Classes:
com.strandgenomics.imaging.icore.bioformats.BioPixelDataOverlay, PixelDataOverlay, RawPixelDataOverlay
public interface IPixelDataOverlay
extends Disposable

An overlay of two or more channels

Author:
arunabha

Method Summary
 int getFrameNumber()
          The frame number of the image to overlay with channels

          Returns the RGB BufferedImage instance associated with this image source for specified ROI
 int getImageHeight()
          Returns the height (in pixels) of the images represented by this source Note that height is same for all images within the record

          Returns the width (in pixels) of the images represented by this source Note that width is same for all images within the record

getImage

BufferedImage getImage(boolean zStacked,
                       boolean mosaic,
                       boolean useChannelColor,
                       Rectangle roi)
                       throws IOException
Returns the RGB BufferedImage instance associated with this image source for specified ROI

Parameters:
zStacked - true for Maximum Intensity Projection across slices, false otherwise
mosaic -
useChannelColor - true if a color image (based on the channel color) is returned, gray-scale image otherwise
roi - specified region of interest
Returns:
BufferedImage instance associated with this image source
Throws:
IOException
